infoCards.heading: 10-Week Masterclass
infoCards.text: Transform from a normal human being to a Ninja Programmer and unlock your hidden talent within just 10 weeks.

priceCards.heading: beginner
priceCards.text: Build simple and fun applications in Python, the most powerful programming language today.

doubleColumnHero.heading:
We Are
The Fun Factory
doubleColumnHero.subHeading: We’re not just any kindergarten, we’re a place with fun teachers and an exciting environment for your child. Here at the Fun Factory, we focus on developing important skills with activities both inside and outside of the classroom, giving your child the best time of their life!
